text:
The Starbucks at VivoCity is a perfect spot for a coffee break while shopping or enjoying the waterfront views. The store is spacious with plenty of seating options, both indoors and outdoors, making it a great place to relax or catch up on work.

The staff are friendly and efficient, even during busy hours, and the coffee is consistently great, as expected from Starbucks. I particularly love the outdoor seating area—it offers a nice view and a relaxing atmosphere.

The only downside is that it can get crowded during peak shopping hours, but that’s expected given its prime location. Overall, it’s a cozy and convenient café that lives up to the Starbucks experience!
Best Starbuck shop in Dis 7, friendly and nice staff, brings the comfort and peaceful feeling. Everyone should come here to enjoy the beautiful day with best friends and can shopping here also.
Nice place to chill, good service and couldn’t resist getting a dog Starbucks card!
The blandest vanilla latte I’ve ever had in my life, don’t even bother. Also all the plug sockets have been locked so you can’t charge anything here
I only came to Starbucks for my birthday voucher, but was fairly disappointed. The earl grey latte was just a teabag (with microplastics!!) in water and milk, and the yuzu tea was also just a teabag.
